```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Read in human self-paced reading and eye-tracking data, get by-word (across subjects) averages, and save
# For natural stories, create a code for each token

brown_spr = read.csv("../data/corpora/brown_spr.csv") %>%
  group_by(code, word) %>%
    summarise(psychometric = mean(time)) %>%
  ungroup()
write.table(brown_spr, "../data/human_rts/bnc-brown/bnc-brown.txt", sep="\t", row.names = F)

natural_spr = read.csv("../data/corpora/natural_stories_rts.tsv", sep="\t") %>%
  mutate(code = (item*10000) + zone) %>%
  group_by(code, word) %>%
    summarise(psychometric = mean(RT)) %>%
  ungroup()
write.table(natural_spr, "../data/human_rts/natural-stories/natural-stories.txt", sep="\t", row.names = F)



```
